DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Captopril may protect lung side effect bone marrow stem cell transplantation . PURPOSE : Randomized phase III trial determine effectiveness captopril lessen side effect patient undergo bone marrow stem cell transplantation follow chemotherapy radiation therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Captopril Treating Patients Undergoing Bone Marrow Stem Cell Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine captopril block prevent lung injury patient undergo autologous bone marrow stem cell transplantation follow cyclophosphamide total body radiotherapy high dose chemotherapy . II . Determine series surrogate lung injury prediction marker monitor patient undergoing therapy . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratify accord preparative regimen ( high dose chemotherapy versus cyclophosphamide total body radiotherapy ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . All patient undergo condition regimen consist cyclophosphamide daily day -6 -5 total body radiotherapy day -4 -1 , high dose chemotherapy per transplantation protocol . Arm I : Patients receive oral captopril 2 3 time daily begin first day condition regimen continue day 100 post autologous bone marrow stem cell transplantation . Arm II : Patients receive captopril undergo condition therapy . Patients follow 6 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 35 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Eligible exist autologous bone marrow stem cell transplantation protocols use either high dose chemotherapy regimen cyclophosphamide total body radiotherapy regimen PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : Not specify Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Not specify Renal : Not specify Other : No concurrent medical illness would preclude study PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics No prior captopril ACE inhibitor
